mapper.sql: id, fileNo, receiveDate, senderOrgan, fileCaption, keyWord, haveAffix, confidential, express, copies, state, recorder, auditor, auditing, draftsman, drafting, authorizeMan, authorizing, tranPerson, transacting, remark, receiver
mapper.select: select * from EnreRFile where state = #{state} AND receiver=#{receiver}
